name: Elderine: Dreams to Destiny
description: A story-driven role-playing game. Rescue people, build a base, farm, craft, explore.
minimum_requirements: OS: WindowsR 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit) Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 1024x768 High Color + DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 400 MB available space
